It includes information about government fees, taxes, and service charges, as well as a breakdown of voice usage and account adjustments. This document contains detailed records of voice usage for a specific phone number (561-308-0282) over several days in November 2004. It includes call times, durations, and locations, indicating extensive communication activity. The records may be relevant for understanding connections and communications related to the Epstein case. It provides insights into the communication patterns associated with this number over a specified period.
